name: Background - For These Sites
description:
You can add your sites by editing the userstyle.
Now works also on all the rss pages (the site's feed page).
Check also my style 45783 and style 47510 and style 47511

and style 105382

user.name: LL25255252
user.about: I sometimes forget to check my userstyles RSS so if you want to report a problem send me a private message instead of starting a new discussion/review/question.

css:
@namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);
@-moz-document 

/* replace the "ttt" to add domains or sites */

,regexp("^http://www.huffingtonpost.*html.*")


{


/* *      /* remarked b/c conflict with Firegestures - trail drawing not shown */
div,div * ,li    
,html,body,td,span,p,font,dd,h1,h2,h3,h4,h5,h6

{text-shadow:none!important;color:black!important;background-color:#C1D7F2!important;
}

/* e.g. forums.mozillazine.org */
blockquote {
border-color:#875!important;border-width:2px!important;}
blockquote *,blockquote
{text-shadow:none!important;color:black!important;background-color:#bef!important;
}


blockquote.uncited span{color:#070!important;} /* for many forums */

textarea {border-color:#990000!important;}



div.Accent {font-style:normal !important;color:maroon !important} /* for synonym.com */

/*                  */
/* forum pagination */
/*                  */
div.topic-actions strong
,td span.pagecurrent
{border-color:#ff0!important;} 

a:link {color: mediumblue !important}
a:visited {color: purple !important} 
a:hover, a:active {color:#8F006A!important}

input {border-color:#2E8B57!important;} /* except the input fields */

div.popmenubutton#topicmenu-options ,div.popmenubutton#topicmenu-options a
{color:#fff!important;background:#f61!important;} /* options menu in threads like in hydrogenaudio.org/forums */

}
